description:
Refactor backend to lazy-load agent modules and heavy dependencies (LightRAG, transformers) only when first used. Add parallel initialization for independent services. Measure and display startup time breakdown.

**Rationale:** Backend startup time impacts developer iteration speed, especially during frequent restarts while debugging. Current synchronous loading of all agents and ML dependencies likely adds unnecessary seconds to every restart cycle.
title: Parallel Backend Module Loading with Lazy Imports
